text: The Outfit is a 1973 American crime movie directed by John Flynn and is an adaptation of the novel of the same name by Richard Stark, pseudonym of Donald E. Westlake. It stars Robert Duvall, Karen Black, Joe Don Baker, Robert Ryan, Timothy Carey and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1973 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Flynn Category:MGM movies
title: The Outfit (1973 movie)
